reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 625/20: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITIES

content.section: Regulation-making powers delegated to the Minister
content.content: 1. The power to make a regulation under the following provisions is delegated to the Minister under clause 83 (1) (o) of the Act: 1. Clause 83 (1) (a) of the Act in respect of, i. prescribing persons for the purposes of subclause 38 (1) (a) (iii) of the Act, ii. prescribing legislation for the purposes of subclause 38 (1) (c) (ii) of the Act, iii. prescribing requirements for a licence for the purposes of clause 38 (1) (e) of the Act, iii.1 prescribing tax laws and regulations for the purposes of clause 38 (1) (f) of the Act, iv. prescribing material change for the purpose of subsection 38 (2), v. prescribing the time for reapplication for the purposes of clause 46 (a) of the Act, and vi. prescribing material change for the purpose of section 52 of the Act. 2. Clauses 83 (1) (f), (g) and (h) of the Act. O. Reg. 625/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 443/22, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The power to make a regulation under the following provisions is delegated to the Minister under clause 83 (1) (o) of the Act:

1. Clause 83 (1) (a) of the Act in respect of,

i. prescribing persons for the purposes of subclause 38 (1) (a) (iii) of the Act,

ii. prescribing legislation for the purposes of subclause 38 (1) (c) (ii) of the Act,

iii. prescribing requirements for a licence for the purposes of clause 38 (1) (e) of the Act,

iii.1 prescribing tax laws and regulations for the purposes of clause 38 (1) (f) of the Act,

iv. prescribing material change for the purpose of subsection 38 (2),

v. prescribing the time for reapplication for the purposes of clause 46 (a) of the Act, and

vi. prescribing material change for the purpose of section 52 of the Act.

2. Clauses 83 (1) (f), (g) and (h) of the Act. O. Reg. 625/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 443/22, s. 1.

content.section: Regulation-making powers delegated to the Minister
content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
